titleStmt.title: The Art of defence in which the several sorts of guards, passes, and disarmes, &c are represented by proper figures with their respective explications.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed & coulered & sold by John King att ye signe of ye Globe in ye Poultry,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Wing suggests "for John Marshall" as part of imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

person.persName: John King att ye signe of ye Globe
